title: Rahu Transit in the 12th House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the 12th house for Taurus Ascendant heightens themes of isolation, hidden fears, foreign connections, and subconscious patterns. Expenses may rise unexpectedly, often linked to travel, health, or intangible pursuits. Sleep and mental peace can feel disturbed as suppressed anxieties surface. This phase pulls attention away from visibility toward inner worlds, secrecy, and behind-the-scenes activity. When approached with discipline and awareness, Rahu supports deep psychological cleansing, spiritual exploration, and release of self-sabotaging habits that block long-term stability.

sections.heading: Expenses & Loss Patterns
points: Money flows toward foreign or unseen areas

sections.heading: Foreign Links & Escapism
points: Attraction to distant or unfamiliar spaces

sections.heading: Spiritual Release & Healing
points: Interest in spiritual or mystical paths

closing: Rahu in the 12th house dissolves illusions through withdrawal and awareness. Conscious discipline transforms loss into liberation and inner strength.
